{"step_by_step_thinking": "The patient's presentation of a firm, painless neck mass that has not changed in size, along with a family history of medullary thyroid cancer, suggests a thyroid neoplasm. This is a characteristic histological finding in medullary thyroid cancer. The other options do not fit with the clinical picture.
